about_the_game:
Help wanted: Intergalactic Data Couriers Needed!

In a universe where FTL interstellar travel exists but FTL communications do not, private couriers play a key role in transporting massive amounts of data between star systems.

Apply and join the ranks of these intrepid and entrepreneurial pilots, but beware - interstellar travel is not for the faint of heart. It's easy going once you enter warp, but building up the kinetic energy needed to activate a warp drive requires careful but fast maneuvering through asteroid-filled hostile space.

  • Visually stimulating sensory experience.
  • Upgrade your ship with essential equipment: Weapons to clear away obstacles, defenses to withstand any bumps you may take, and flight upgrades to boost your speed and maneuverability.
  • Give yourself more of an edge by trading collected Dark Matter in the Subspace Market for mods of questionable legality.
  • Boost your chances with consumable power-ups that can salvage missions from certain failure.
  • Make your fortune while trying to build up the prowess to reach the ultimate, most lucrative, and most dangerous client world of Thend.
  • Retire, earn prestige, and hand off the reins to a new upstart pilot with a unique talent or two, knowing that your accomplishments and long-term investments will make the road to Thend easier for your successors.
  • Challenge yourself with unlockable alternate game modes: Challenge Mode progressively increases a level's difficulty, Timed Mode straps an explosive with timer to your ship, and Infinite Mode lets you go as far as you possibly can in a level.
  • Customize your ship from over 200 million ship part combinations.
  • Experience true achievement overload with over 500 in-game Achievements and 76 Steam Achievements.
  • Fun unlockable extras - Dice, ducks, carrots, eyes, colorful explosions, and horns.
  • Fully remappable game and UI controls. Supports Keyboard, Keyboard/Mouse, or Gamepad.
  • Special advanced feature for improved personal arcade cabinet experience: Moddable control icons

Advisory Information:
  • Contains flashing and strobing lights
detailed_description:
Help wanted: Intergalactic Data Couriers Needed!

In a universe where FTL interstellar travel exists but FTL communications do not, private couriers play a key role in transporting massive amounts of data between star systems.

Apply and join the ranks of these intrepid and entrepreneurial pilots, but beware - interstellar travel is not for the faint of heart. It's easy going once you enter warp, but building up the kinetic energy needed to activate a warp drive requires careful but fast maneuvering through asteroid-filled hostile space.

  • Upgrade your ship with essential equipment: Weapons to clear away obstacles, defenses to withstand any bumps you may take, and flight upgrades to boost your speed and maneuverability.
  • Give yourself more of an edge by trading collected Dark Matter in the Subspace Market for mods of questionable legality.
  • Boost your chances with consumable power-ups that can salvage missions from certain failure.
  • Make your fortune while trying to build up the prowess to reach the ultimate, most lucrative, and most dangerous client world of Thend.
  • Retire, earn prestige, and hand off the reins to a new upstart pilot with a unique talent or two, knowing that your accomplishments and long-term investments will make the road to Thend easier for your successors.
  • Challenge yourself with unlockable alternate game modes: Challenge Mode progressively increases a level's difficulty, Timed Mode straps an explosive with timer to your ship, and Infinite Mode lets you go as far as you possibly can in a level.
  • Customize your ship from over 200 million ship part combinations.

  • Fun unlockable extras - Dice, ducks, carrots, eyes, colorful explosions, and horns.
  • Fully remappable game and UI controls. Supports Keyboard, Keyboard/Mouse, or Gamepad.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 6th Gen or Equivalent, X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or better, DirectX 11 or 12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 6th Gen or Equivalent, X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or better, DirectX 11 or 12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Intense, exciting, and visually stimulating arcade spaceflight through dense fields of asteroids, hostile ships, and other obstacles.
